description.zh-cn: 出生于福建漳州。
description.en: Born in Zhangzhou, Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 曾担任福建师范大学校长。
description.en: Formerly served as President of Fujian Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 曾担任福建师范大学党委书记。
description.en: Formerly served as Party Committee Secretary of Fujian Normal University.

relationships.target: 中国共产党福建省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 自2016年3月起担任中共福建省纪委副书记。
description.en: Has served as Deputy Secretary of the CPC Fujian Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection since March 2016.

description.zh-cn: 为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 为福建师范大学校友。
description.en: Is an alumnus of Fujian Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 为北京体育大学校友。
description.en: Is an alumnus of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 为福建师范大学教授。
description.en: Is a professor at Fujian Normal University.
